sql.isNotEmpty: u.DELIVER_ORDER_ID in (select DELIVER_ORDER_ID from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL where RECV_CHANN_NO like '%'||#RECV_CHANN_NO#||'%' and DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG#)
u.DELIVER_ORDER_ID in (select DELIVER_ORDER_ID from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL where RECV_CHANN_NAME like '%'||#RECV_CHANN_NAME#||'%' and DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG#)
u.DELIVER_ORDER_ID in (select DELIVER_ORDER_ID from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL where ADVC_SEND_DATE = to_date(#ADVC_SEND_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD') and DEL_FLAG=0)
u.DELIVER_ORDER_ID in (select DELIVER_ORDER_ID from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL where RECV_ADDR_NO like '%'||#RECV_ADDR_NO#||'%' and DEL_FLAG=0)
u.DELIVER_ORDER_ID in (select DELIVER_ORDER_ID from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL where RECV_ADDR like '%'||#RECV_ADDR#||'%' and DEL_FLAG=0)
u.DELIVER_ORDER_ID in( select d.DELIVER_ORDER_ID from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL d where d.ORDER_CHANN_ID in (select CHANN_ID from BASE_CHANN t where 1=1 $PROV_SQL$) )

u.DELIVER_ORDER_ID in ( select d.DELIVER_ORDER_ID from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL d where d.SALE_ORDER_ID in (select s.SALE_ORDER_ID from ERP_SALE_ORDER s where s.SALE_ORDER_NO like '%'||#SALE_ORDER_NO#||'%' ) )
u.DELIVER_ORDER_ID in (select a.DELIVER_ORDER_ID from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_NO) like upper('%'||#PRD_NO#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)
u.DELIVER_ORDER_ID in (select a.DELIVER_ORDER_ID from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_NAME) like upper('%'||#PRD_NAME#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)
u.DELIVER_ORDER_ID in (select a.DELIVER_ORDER_ID from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_SPEC) like upper('%'||#PRD_SPEC#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)

u.DELIVER_ORDER_ID in( ( select DELIVER_ORDER_ID from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER start with DELIVER_ORDER_ID in (select DELIVER_ORDER_ID from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER where DELIVER_ORDER_NO like '%'||#FROM_BILL_NO#||'%') connect by prior DELIVER_ORDER_ID = FROM_BILL_ID) union all (select DELIVER_ORDER_ID from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER start with DELIVER_ORDER_ID in (select DELIVER_ORDER_ID from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER where DELIVER_ORDER_NO like '%'||#FROM_BILL_NO#||'%') connect by prior FROM_BILL_ID = DELIVER_ORDER_ID) )

sqlMap.sql: select u.DELIVER_ORDER_ID, u.DELIVER_ORDER_NO, u.DELIVER_TYPE, u.TRUCK_TYPE, u.CHANN_TYPE, u.AREA_SER_ID, u.AREA_SER_NO, u.AREA_SER_NAME, u.SEND_CHANN_ID, u.SEND_CHANN_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_CHANN_ID, u.RECV_CHANN_NO, u.RECV_CHANN_NAME, u.ADVC_SEND_DATE, u.TOTAL_VOLUME, u.STATE, u.REMARK, u.SHIP_POINT_ID, u.SHIP_POINT_NAME, to_char(u.APPCH_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') APPCH_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.DEL_FLAG, u.BILL_TYPE, u.ORDER_CHANN_ID, u.ORDER_CHANN_NO, u.ORDER_CHANN_NAME, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.FROM_BILL_ID, NVL(u.IS_ALL_FREEZE_FLAG,0)IS_ALL_FREEZE_FLAG, u.RECV_ADDR_NO, addr.DELIVER_DTL_ADDR, tmp.RECV_CHANN_NAME TEM_RECV_CHANN_NAME from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER u left join BASE_DELIVER_ADDR addr on u.RECV_ADDR_NO=addr.DELIVER_ADDR_NO and addr.STATE='启用' and addr.DEL_FLAG=0 left join (select max(b.RECV_CHANN_NAME) RECV_CHANN_NAME,b.DELIVER_ORDER_ID from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL b group by b.DELIVER_ORDER_ID) tmp on u.DELIVER_ORDER_ID = tmp.DELIVER_ORDER_ID
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM ERP_DELIVER_ORDER u

select b.SALE_ORDER_NO, b.STOREOUT_NO, b.U9_SM_NO, b.ORDER_CHANN_NO, b.ORDER_CHANN_NAME, f.RECV_ADDR_NO, f.RECV_ADDR, a.PRD_NAME, c.PAR_PRD_NAME, c.PRD_SPEC, e.SPCL_SPEC_REMARK, c.PRD_COLOR, c.BRAND, c.STD_UNIT, a.STOREOUT_NUM, a.DECT_PRICE, a.DECT_AMOUNT, d.REMARK, e.SPCL_TECH_ID, e.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, a.PRICE, c.PAR_PRD_NAME from ERP_STOREOUT_PRD_DTL a left join ERP_STOREOUT b on a.STOREOUT_ID = b.STOREOUT_ID left join BASE_PRODUCT c on a.PRD_ID=c.PRD_ID left join ERP_SALE_ORDER_DTL d on a.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID=d.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID left join DRP_SPCL_TECH e on d.SPCL_TECH_ID=e.SPCL_TECH_ID and e.USE_FLAG=1 left join ERP_SALE_ORDER f on d.SALE_ORDER_ID=f.SALE_ORDER_ID where a.DEL_FLAG=0 and b.DEL_FLAG=0 and c.DEL_FLAG=0 and d.DEL_FLAG=0 and f.DEL_FLAG=0 and b.DELIVER_ORDER_ID=#DELIVER_ORDER_ID#
sqlMap.update:
update ERP_DELIVER_ORDER
REMARK = #REMARK# ADVC_SEND_DATE = to_date(#ADVC_SEND_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD') UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_TIME = to_date((case when to_char(sysdate, 'hh24') < '18' then to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:SS') else to_char(sysdate - 1 / 24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:SS') end),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:SS') STATE = #STATE# TRUCK_TYPE = #TRUCK_TYPE# APPCH_TIME = to_date(#APPCH_TIME#,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
SHIP_POINT_ID = #SHIP_POINT_ID# SHIP_POINT_NAME = #SHIP_POINT_NAME#
where DELIVER_ORDER_ID = #DELIVER_ORDER_ID#
sqlMap.select: select u.DELIVER_ORDER_ID, u.DELIVER_ORDER_NO, u.DELIVER_TYPE, u.TRUCK_TYPE, u.CHANN_TYPE, u.AREA_SER_ID, u.AREA_SER_NO, u.AREA_SER_NAME, u.SEND_CHANN_ID, u.SEND_CHANN_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_CHANN_ID, u.RECV_CHANN_NO, u.RECV_CHANN_NAME, u.ADVC_SEND_DATE, u.TOTAL_VOLUME, u.STATE, u.REMARK, u.SHIP_POINT_ID, u.SHIP_POINT_NAME, to_char(u.APPCH_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')APPCH_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.DEL_FLAG, u.BILL_TYPE, u.ORDER_CHANN_ID, u.ORDER_CHANN_NO, u.ORDER_CHANN_NAME, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, NVL(u.IS_ALL_FREEZE_FLAG,0)IS_ALL_FREEZE_FLAG from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER u where u.DELIVER_ORDER_ID = #DELIVER_ORDER_ID#
sqlMap.sql: select u.DELIVER_ORDER_DTL_ID, u.DELIVER_ORDER_ID, u.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID, u.SALE_ORDER_ID, u.SALE_ORDER_NO, u.ORDER_CHANN_ID, u.ORDER_CHANN_NO, u.ORDER_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_CHANN_ID, u.RECV_CHANN_NO, u.RECV_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_ADDR, u.RECV_ADDR_NO, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, u.VOLUME, u.IS_NO_STAND_FLAG, u.SPCL_TECH_ID, u.REMARK, u.SESSION_ID, u.IS_BACKUP_FLAG, NVL(u.ADVC_PLAN_NUM, 0)ADVC_PLAN_NUM, NVL(u.PLAN_NUM, 0)PLAN_NUM, NVL(u.REAL_SEND_NUM, 0)REAL_SEND_NUM, u.NO_SEND_DEAL_TYPE, u.DEL_FLAG, a.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, a.SPCL_SPEC_REMARK, u.VOLUME, u.DECT_PRICE, u.IS_FREE_FLAG, u.U9_SALE_ORDER_NO, u.U9_SALE_ORDER_DTL_NO, u.IS_SEND_FIN, u.NEW_SPEC, u.NEW_COLOR, u.EXPAND_REMARK, to_char(u.ADVC_SEND_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') ADVC_SEND_DATE, p.PAR_PRD_NAME, u.CREDIT_FREEZE_PRICE, (case when length(u.RECV_ADDR)>40 then substr(u.RECV_ADDR, 0, 20)||'...' else u.RECV_ADDR end )RECV_ADDR_SHORT, NVL(b.ORDER_NUM,0)ORDER_NUM, NVL(b.SENDED_NUM,0)SENDED_NUM, (NVL(b.ORDER_NUM, 0) - NVL(b.SENDED_NUM, 0))NO_SEND_NUM, b.PRICE from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL u left join DRP_SPCL_TECH a on u.SPCL_TECH_ID = a.SPCL_TECH_ID and a.USE_FLAG = 1 left join BASE_PRODUCT p on u.PRD_ID = p.PRD_ID left join ERP_SALE_ORDER_DTL b on b.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID=u.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID

select u.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID, u.SALE_ORDER_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, u.IS_BACKUP_FLAG, u.PRICE, u.DECT_RATE, u.DECT_PRICE, u.ORDER_NUM, u.ORDER_AMOUNT, to_char(u.ADVC_SEND_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') ADVC_SEND_DATE, u.REMARK, u.SESSION_ID, u.TECH_PRICE_MULT, u.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID, u.CANCEL_FLAG, u.DEL_FLAG, u.IS_CAN_PRD_FLAG, u.IS_NO_STAND_FLAG, NVL(u.PLANED_NUM,0)PLANED_NUM, NVL(u.SENDED_NUM,0)SENDED_NUM, (u.ORDER_NUM-NVL(u.PLANED_NUM,0))NO_PLAND_NUM, u.SPCL_TECH_ID, a.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, s.SALE_ORDER_NO, s.ORDER_CHANN_NO, s.ORDER_CHANN_NAME, s.ORDER_DATE, s.AREA_NO, s.AREA_NAME, b.AREA_SER_ID, b.AREA_SER_NAME, u.VOLUME, u.PRIC from ERP_SALE_ORDER_DTL u left join ERP_SALE_ORDER s on u.SALE_ORDER_ID = s.SALE_ORDER_ID left join BASE_CHANN b on s.ORDER_CHANN_ID = b.CHANN_ID left join DRP_SPCL_TECH a on u.SPCL_TECH_ID = a.SPCL_TECH_ID and a.USE_FLAG = 1
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt from ERP_SALE_ORDER_DTL u left join ERP_SALE_ORDER s on u.SALE_ORDER_ID = s.SALE_ORDER_ID left join BASE_CHANN b on s.ORDER_CHANN_ID = b.CHANN_ID

select u.DELIVER_ORDER_NO, to_char(b.ADVC_SEND_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ADVC_SEND_DATE, u.BILL_TYPE, u.DELIVER_TYPE, u.TRUCK_TYPE, u.CHANN_TYPE, u.SHIP_POINT_NAME, u.AREA_SER_NO, u.AREA_SER_NAME, u.SEND_CHANN_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_NAME, b.ORDER_CHANN_NO, b.ORDER_CHANN_NAME, b.RECV_CHANN_NO, b.RECV_CHANN_NAME, u.JOIN_DELIVER_ORDER_NO, to_char(u.APPCH_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') APPCH_TIME, NVL((select sum(NVL(c.VOLUME,0) * NVL(c.PLAN_NUM,0)) from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL c where c.DELIVER_ORDER_ID = u.DELIVER_ORDER_ID and DEL_FLAG = 0),0) ALLVOL, u.STATE, u.REMARK PRIMARYREMARK, u.CRE_NAME, u.PRVD_NO, u.PRVD_NAME, to_char(u.CRE_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, b.SALE_ORDER_NO, b.PRD_NO, b.PRD_NAME, b.PRD_SPEC, b.PRD_COLOR, b.BRAND, b.STD_UNIT, NVL(b.REAL_SEND_NUM,0)REAL_SEND_NUM, NVL(b.PLAN_NUM,0)PLAN_NUM, (NVL(b.PLAN_NUM,0)-NVL(b.REAL_SEND_NUM,0))NO_SEND_NUM, NVL(b.DECT_PRICE,0)DECT_PRICE, (NVL(b.DECT_PRICE,0)*NVL(b.PLAN_NUM,0)) ALLPRICE, NVL((NVL(b.VOLUME,0)*NVL(b.NO_SEND_NUM,0)),0) NOSENDVOLDTL, NVL(b.VOLUME,0)VOLUME, (NVL(b.VOLUME,0)*NVL(b.PLAN_NUM,0)) ALLVOLDTL, b.NO_SEND_DEAL_TYPE, d.SPCL_DTL_REMARK SPCL_SPEC_REMARK, (case when b.IS_NO_STAND_FLAG=1 then '是' else '否' end) IS_NO_STAND_FLAG, (case when b.IS_BACKUP_FLAG=1 then '是' else '否' end) IS_BACKUP_FLAG, (case when b.IS_FREE_FLAG=1 then '是' else '否' end) IS_FREE_FLAG, NVL(b.ADVC_PLAN_NUM,0)ADVC_PLAN_NUM, e.DELIVER_DTL_ADDR, b.REMARK, (case when NVL(b.PLAN_NUM,0)=NVL(b.REAL_SEND_NUM,0) and NVL(b.PLAN_NUM,0)>0 then '已发' when NVL(b.REAL_SEND_NUM,0)=0 and NVL(b.PLAN_NUM,0)>0 then '未发' when NVL(b.PLAN_NUM,0)=0 then '不发' else '部分发' end ) ROWSTATE, b.RECV_ADDR_NO, b.RECV_ADDR, b.U9_SALE_ORDER_DTL_NO, b.U9_SALE_ORDER_NO, f.PAR_PRD_NAME from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER u left join ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL b on u.DELIVER_ORDER_ID = b.DELIVER_ORDER_ID and b.DEL_FLAG=0 left join DRP_SPCL_TECH d on b.SPCL_TECH_ID=d.SPCL_TECH_ID and d.USE_FLAG=1 left join BASE_DELIVER_ADDR e on e.DELIVER_ADDR_NO=b.RECV_ADDR_NO and e.DEL_FLAG=0 and e.STATE='启用' left join BASE_PRODUCT f on f.PRD_ID=b.PRD_ID

sql.isNotEmpty: a.SALE_ORDER_ID = b.SALE_ORDER_ID and NVL(b.ORDER_NUM,0) > NVL(b.SENDED_NUM,0) and a.ORDER_CHANN_ID in $CHANNS_CHARG$ and b.STATE='正常' and a.STATE='待发货'
a.SALE_ORDER_ID in( select d.SALE_ORDER_ID from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL d where d.ORDER_CHANN_ID in (select CHANN_ID from BASE_CHANN t where 1=1 $PROV_SQL$) )

sqlMap.sql: select a.SALE_ORDER_NO, a.FROM_BILL_NO, a.BILL_TYPE, a.RECV_ADDR_NO, b.IS_FREE_FLAG, b.PRD_NO, b.PRD_NAME, b.PRD_SPEC, c.SPCL_SPEC_REMARK, b.ORDER_NUM, NVL(b.SENDED_NUM,0)SENDED_NUM, (NVL(b.ORDER_NUM, 0) - NVL(b.SENDED_NUM, 0)) NO_SEND_NUM, e.PLAN_NUM, a.SALE_ORDER_ID, b.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID, b.PRD_ID, b.BRAND, b.STD_UNIT, a.RECV_ADDR, b.VOLUME, b.DECT_PRICE, f.PAR_PRD_NAME, b.U9_SALE_ORDER_NO, f.PRD_COLOR, b.PRICE, a.ORDER_CHANN_ID, a.ORDER_CHANN_NO, a.ORDER_CHANN_NAME, c.SPCL_TECH_NO, c.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, c.SPCL_TECH_ID, b.IS_BACKUP_FLAG, b.REMARK, b.CREDIT_FREEZE_PRICE, to_char(b.ADVC_SEND_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') ADVC_SEND_DATE from ERP_SALE_ORDER a, ERP_SALE_ORDER_DTL b left join DRP_SPCL_TECH c on b.SPCl_TECH_ID = c.SPCL_TECH_ID left join (select d.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID, sum(d.PLAN_NUM) PLAN_NUM from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL d where d.IS_SEND_FIN = 0 and d.DEL_FLAG = 0 group by SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID) e on b.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID = e.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID left join BASE_PRODUCT f on f.PRD_ID=b.PRD_ID
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt from ERP_SALE_ORDER a, ERP_SALE_ORDER_DTL b left join DRP_SPCL_TECH c on b.SPCl_TECH_ID = c.SPCL_TECH_ID left join (select d.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID, sum(d.PLAN_NUM) PLAN_NUM from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL d where d.IS_SEND_FIN = 0 and d.DEL_FLAG = 0 group by SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID) e on b.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID = e.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID left join BASE_PRODUCT f on f.PRD_ID=b.PRD_ID
sqlMap.insert: insert into ERP_DELIVER_ORDER( DELIVER_ORDER_ID, DELIVER_ORDER_NO, DELIVER_TYPE, PRVD_ID, PRVD_NO, PRVD_NAME, TRUCK_TYPE, ADVC_SEND_DATE, STATE, REMARK, CREATOR, CRE_NAME, CRE_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, DEL_FLAG, SHIP_POINT_ID, SHIP_POINT_NAME, APPCH_TIME, BILL_TYPE ) values( #DELIVER_ORDER_ID#, #DELIVER_ORDER_NO#, #DELIVER_TYPE#, #PRVD_ID#, #PRVD_NO#, #PRVD_NAME#, #TRUCK_TYPE#, to_date(#ADVC_SEND_DATE#,'yyyy-mm-dd'), #STATE#, #REMARK#, #CREATOR#, #CRE_NAME#, to_date((case when to_char(sysdate, 'hh24') < '18' then to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:SS') else to_char(sysdate - 1 / 24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:SS') end),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:SS'), #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #DEL_FLAG#, #SHIP_POINT_ID#, #SHIP_POINT_NAME#, to_date(#APPCH_TIME#,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #BILL_TYPE# )

insert into ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL( DELIVER_ORDER_DTL_ID, DELIVER_ORDER_ID, SALE_ORDER_ID, SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID, SALE_ORDER_NO, ORDER_CHANN_ID, ORDER_CHANN_NO, ORDER_CHANN_NAME, RECV_CHANN_ID, RECV_CHANN_NO, RECV_CHANN_NAME, PRD_ID, PRD_NO, PRD_NAME, PRD_SPEC, PRD_COLOR, BRAND, STD_UNIT, VOLUME, IS_NO_STAND_FLAG, RECV_ADDR, REMARK, SESSION_ID, PLAN_NUM, DEL_FLAG, U_CODE, GOODS_ORDER_NO, SPCL_TECH_ID, DECT_PRICE, CREDIT_FREEZE_PRICE, RECV_ADDR_NO, IS_BACKUP_FLAG, IS_FREE_FLAG, U9_SALE_ORDER_NO, U9_SALE_ORDER_DTL_NO, NEW_SPEC, NEW_COLOR, ADVC_SEND_DATE ) select #DELIVER_ORDER_DTL_ID#, #DELIVER_ORDER_ID#, a.SALE_ORDER_ID, a.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID, b.SALE_ORDER_NO, b.ORDER_CHANN_ID, b.ORDER_CHANN_NO, b.ORDER_CHANN_NAME, b.RECV_CHANN_ID, b.RECV_CHANN_NO, b.RECV_CHANN_NAME, a.PRD_ID, a.PRD_NO, a.PRD_NAME, a.PRD_SPEC, a.PRD_COLOR, a.BRAND, a.STD_UNIT, a.VOLUME, a.IS_NO_STAND_FLAG, b.RECV_ADDR, #REMARK#, SESSION_ID, #PLAN_NUM#, #DEL_FLAG#, a.U_CODE, a.GOODS_ORDER_NO, a.SPCL_TECH_ID, a.DECT_PRICE, a.CREDIT_FREEZE_PRICE, b.RECV_ADDR_NO, a.IS_BACKUP_FLAG, a.IS_FREE_FLAG, a.U9_SALE_ORDER_NO, a.U9_SALE_ORDER_DTL_NO, a.NEW_SPEC, a.NEW_COLOR, a.ADVC_SEND_DATE from ERP_SALE_ORDER_DTL a left join ERP_SALE_ORDER b on a.SALE_ORDER_ID=b.SALE_ORDER_ID where SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID=#SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where DELIVER_ORDER_DTL_ID in ($DELIVER_ORDER_DTL_IDS$)
update ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where DELIVER_ORDER_ID =#DELIVER_ORDER_ID#
update ERP_DELIVER_ORDER set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG#,UPD_NAME=#UPD_NAME#,UPDATOR=#UPDATOR#,UPD_TIME=sysdate where DELIVER_ORDER_ID = #DELIVER_ORDER_ID#
sqlMap.update:
update ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL
REMARK = #REMARK# PLAN_NUM = #PLAN_NUM#
where DELIVER_ORDER_DTL_ID = #DELIVER_ORDER_DTL_ID#
update ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL set IS_SEND_FIN=#IS_SEND_FIN# where DELIVER_ORDER_ID=#DELIVER_ORDER_ID# and DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ERP_DELIVER_FREEZE_DTL( DELIVER_FREEZE_DTL_ID, DELIVER_ORDER_ID, ORDER_CHANN_ID, ORDER_CHANN_NO, ORDER_CHANN_NAME, FREEZE_AMOUNT, DEL_FLAG )values( #DELIVER_FREEZE_DTL_ID#, #DELIVER_ORDER_ID#, #ORDER_CHANN_ID#, #ORDER_CHANN_NO#, #ORDER_CHANN_NAME#, #FREEZE_AMOUNT#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.update:
update ERP_DELIVER_FREEZE_DTL
ORDER_CHANN_ID = #ORDER_CHANN_ID# ORDER_CHANN_NO = #ORDER_CHANN_NO# ORDER_CHANN_NAME = #ORDER_CHANN_NAME# FREEZE_AMOUNT = #FREEZE_AMOUNT#
where DELIVER_FREEZE_DTL_ID = #DELIVER_FREEZE_DTL_ID#
update ERP_DELIVER_FREEZE_DTL set DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG# where DELIVER_FREEZE_DTL_ID in ($DELIVER_FREEZE_DTL_IDS$)
update ERP_DELIVER_FREEZE_DTL set DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG# where DELIVER_ORDER_ID =#DELIVER_ORDER_ID#
sqlMap.select: select DELIVER_FREEZE_DTL_ID, DELIVER_ORDER_ID, ORDER_CHANN_ID, ORDER_CHANN_NO, ORDER_CHANN_NAME, FREEZE_AMOUNT from ERP_DELIVER_FREEZE_DTL where DELIVER_ORDER_ID=#DELIVER_ORDER_ID# and DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG#

select DELIVER_FREEZE_DTL_ID, DELIVER_ORDER_ID, ORDER_CHANN_ID, ORDER_CHANN_NO, ORDER_CHANN_NAME, FREEZE_AMOUNT from ERP_DELIVER_FREEZE_DTL where DELIVER_FREEZE_DTL_ID in ($DELIVER_FREEZE_DTL_IDS$) and DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG#

select count(1) NUM from ERP_DELIVER_FREEZE_DTL a left join ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL b on a.DELIVER_ORDER_ID=b.DELIVER_ORDER_ID and a.ORDER_CHANN_ID= b.ORDER_CHANN_ID and b.DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG# where a.DELIVER_ORDER_ID=#DELIVER_ORDER_ID# and a.DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG# and b.DELIVER_ORDER_DTL_ID is null
select count(1) cnt from ERP_DELIVER_FREEZE_DTL where DELIVER_ORDER_ID=#DELIVER_ORDER_ID# group by ORDER_CHANN_ID having count(1)>1
select ORDER_CHANN_ID,ORDER_CHANN_NO from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL where DELIVER_ORDER_ID=#DELIVER_ORDER_ID# and DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG# group by ORDER_CHANN_ID,ORDER_CHANN_NO

select d.SALE_ORDER_NO,d.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID,d.PRD_NO from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL d where d.DELIVER_ORDER_ID=#DELIVER_ORDER_ID# and d.DEL_FLAG=0 group by d.SALE_ORDER_NO,d.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID, d.PRD_NO,d.SPCL_TECH_ID having count(d.PRD_NO)>1
select STATE from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER where DELIVER_ORDER_ID=#DELIVER_ORDER_ID# for update
